mapper.insert: INSERT INTO offer ( id, description, amount, accepted, user_id, tender_id, bidder_id, status) VALUES (#{offer.id}, #{offer.description},#{offer.amount},#{offer.accepted}, #{offer.user.id},#{offer.tender.id}, #{offer.bidder.id}, #{offer.status})
mapper.select: SELECT o.id, o.description, o.amount, o.accepted,o.status, u.username, u.id AS user_id, b.id AS bidder_id, t.id AS tender_id FROM offer o LEFT JOIN user u ON (o.user_id = u.id) LEFT JOIN bidder b ON (o.bidder_id = b.id) LEFT JOIN tender t ON (o.tender_id = t.id) WHERE o.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE offer SET accepted = TRUE, accept_user_id = #{acceptUserId}, status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id};
UPDATE offer SET status = #{status} WHERE tender_id = #{tenderId}
